name: Save the Earth! (rhthdud)
description:
The protagonist that wakes up from his sleep hears the breaking news that paper was falling from the sky. Here's what's written on the paper: First minimize the carbon emissions of the earth. Second turn off the lights for 10 minutes from 8 o'clock. If you violate the above two, the earth will explode immediately. To save the  earth, the protagonist must find and eliminate wasted energy in the house.

-------------

GAME CONTROLS

MOVE - Arrow key

FIND - click

- Move the character closer to the object to find the wasted energy and eliminate it.
